learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Robotics is the design, construction, and operation of robots. Examples: factory equipment, domestic robots, drones.
A robot has a mechanical structure, electronic components (sensors, microprocessors, actuators), and is programmable.

learning_objectives.description: Understand robot roles and explain their advantages/disadvantages.
learning_objectives.notes_and_guidance: Areas: industry, transport, agriculture, medicine, home, entertainment.
